channel.title: When i log on a server i lose al my stats and items!
channel.description: every time i log onm a server mi stats go back down 2 1 and al mi stuf goes

item.title: When i log on a server i lose al my stats and items!
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

man u 4eva9:

every time i log onm a server mi stats go back down 2 1 and al mi stuf goes

If you aren’t going on a server that saves these things for you (or you don’t use the “::save” command on a server with it enabled) then none of your ‘progress’ will be saved.

Read full topic
item.source: When i log on a server i lose al my stats and items!

item.title: When i log on a server i lose al my stats and items!
item.dc:creator: @ollie123 Ollie123
item.description:
@ollie123 wrote:

have you got a folder called ‘characters’ and ‘moreinfo’ and ‘savedgames’? IF Not, Then make them and you should be able to save games

Read full topic
